answers.a: Time to correctly access the input
answers.b: Time to correctly access the output
answers.c: Average rise time and fall time
answers.d: Time taken for the output to come after the input has been captured

question: 2. Can we reduce delay to zero?

answers.c: Yes in most of the cases

question: 3. The optimum size of each inverter is ________ of its neighbours
4. What does Cg1 corresponds to in the following formula?

answers.a: Input gate capacitance of the last inverter driving capacitative load
answers.b: Sum of input capacitances of all the inverter in series
answers.c: Input gate capacitance of first inverter in series

7. Choose the correct statement from the following.

answers.a: All the inveters in series are kept to be of same size for minimum delay
answers.b: The inverter size does not matter as long as the inverter driving the load has very big size
answers.c: The inverter size does not matter as long as the inverter driving the load has very small size
answers.d: The size of the inverter driving the load is maximum of all and is some multiple of size of the previous inverters

question: 8. For minimum delay, what is the number of inverters in the chain connected in series?

answers.d: Need to calculate according to the situation given, it is not fixed.
